hi,
i have packed all my junit testcases in a jar file and put them on the
server where I want my tests to run. 
If I start the TestRunner with 
java junit.swingui.TestRunner  
I get the following message when I am trying to choose a testcase:
No testcase found. Check that the configurated 'TestCollector' is supported
on this platform.

If I start the TestRunner with
java junit.swingui.TestRunner testcase 
that is adding the name of the testcase to run; everything works fine. The
classpath therefore should be all right. Could it be a problem relating to
the fact, that I packed the testcases in a jar file? Any ideas?

regards,
Michael
subject: Running testcases which where added to a jar-file
